schema.note: Base metadata schema for the built in UTI types

type.name: public.item
type.displayattrs: kMDItemKeywords kMDItemWhereFroms kMDItemLastUsedDate
type.readonlyattrs: kMDItemPath kMDItemAttributeChangeDate kMDItemContentType kMDItemContentTypeTree kMDItemDisplayName kMDItemKind kMDItemLastUsedDate kMDItemTextContent

type.name: com.apple.bundle
type.note: This is the base type for all bundles on the system.
type.allattrs: kMDItemCFBundleIdentifier

type.name: com.apple.application
type.note: This is the base type for all applications on the system
type.allattrs: kMDItemCopyright kMDItemVersion

type.name: public.font
type.allattrs: kMDItemAuthors kMDItemCopyright kMDItemFonts

type.name: public.image
type.note: All image types derive from public.image

type.note: Generic calendar event "Event title is stored in kMDItemDisplayName"

type.name: public.to-do-item
type.note: Generic To Do item "To do title is stored in kMDItemDisplayName"
